lyrics.text:
‘A hoto napa’a lilo ē!
‘Ete manatu atu
‘A e fiefia kuo mole,
‘A e Taha kuo ‘alu.

Mole ‘a e nonga ne u ongo’i
‘Eku kamata tui;
‘A e fai manako ‘a e feohi,
Mahino ‘a e mo’ui.

Ko e Laumālie na’a ma ō,
Ko hoku tauhi ma’u;
Teka he fili ke mama’o,
Vovo ‘a e Tohitap
u
.

Ka kuo motu ‘a e kaume’a,
Puli ‘a e ‘ofa’anga;
Kai hoto loto he tautea,
‘O ‘ikai si’i ke na’
a
.

Koe’uma’ā he me’a nge’esi
‘Oku humaki mai;
‘E ‘ikai ifo ha lelei,
Ha mālie ‘o māmani.

‘E Laumālie, foki mai,
Si’i Lupe ‘a e ‘Otua;
Ko e hia na’a ke ‘alu ai
Kuo u sese’e ki tu’a.

Ta toe takaua pē,
Fai ‘a e fe’ofa’aki;
Kau molomolomuiva’e
‘O ō mo Koe ki langi.
